data.persona: I trim the grass every two days.  I wish I could shoot the bow as the archers do.  I have been groundskeeper for 13 years.
data.description:
You are in the Archery zone.
The archery zone is spacious and always bright with light. The field is green and the targets are bright red.
There's some bright red targets, a bow, and a quiver here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a tunic, and wielding a ritual knife and a knife.

data.short_motivation: I put the tunic on the quiver to hide it from view.
data.mid_motivation: I will return after my work to steal the quiver under the tunic.
data.long_motivation: I will use the quiver to practice my archery.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: steal The quiver from The archery zone.
